name: kilogram throughput
notes: One kilogram of agricultural or food throughput

name: wear
notes: One wear of a clothing item

name: kilogram waste handled
notes: One kilogram of municipal solid waste processed

name: cubic metre potable water
notes: One cubic metre of potable water supplied

name: tonne
notes: One metric tonne of material throughput

name: unit
notes: One completed appliance or HVAC unit

name: year
notes: One year of appliance, HVAC, or cold-chain operation

name: kg food-year
notes: Kilograms of food maintained under refrigeration for a year

name: floor-area-year
notes: One square metre of floor area operated for one year
